runs.comm: back and across, Smith works this backward of square with the swing and sharp running brings two down to long leg
cracker! full and swings in towards Smith and beats him on the inside edge of a booming drive
punched down to mid on
comes forward, straight bat and punched out to cover
down the pitch, has a wild swing but was nowhere near that one. Haider gets his first touch of the ball behind the stumps
swings into Smith, stays on the crease and plays into down by his feet
oops! huge wide down the leg side and Haider does well with a sprawling dive to collect
that's better, on middle, but well played by Bosman as he works it into the on side and it's a well judged single
hint of swing into Smith, who lets it go through
CLUBBED! comes down the pitch, swings through the line and past mid off, who didn't seem ready, and it opens the boundary count for South Africa
down the track again, but finds cover this time
swung to mid on, that heavy bat making a loud clunk
well bowled! fuller from Shabbir, drawing Smith into a drive and the ball holds its line and flies through the Haider... plenty still here for the pacemen
tight line from Bosman, played down the track and Rana runs across to field in his follow through
what a beauty! cut Bosman in half as he tries to work to the leg side but is beaten with pace and movement
crunched over cover, that's what Bosman is selected for, he doesn't quite connect cleanly but they run three
SMASH! slower ball, Smith picks it and drives over mid off, it slows up but still makes it to the boundary
outside off stump, tempting from Rana, Smith flashes and misses - he was late on that
fine yorker, but it's a no-ball and in Twenty20 that means a free hit - the bowler can't dismiss the batsmen on the next ball, he can only be run out
WHACK! that's how to deal with a free hit, nothing clever just smash it and Smith goes over cover for another boundary
big swing, big outside edge. Flies down to third man but some sharp work prevents a boundary
nips back into Bosman, keeps it out
a touch too wide and slashed away hard, but brilliant work from Rana down at third man
neatly tucked into the leg side
another no-ball! this one is slammed over cover for four and it's another FREE HIT
well, it's a wide, but no one seems to know what happens now... ah, it's still a free hit
slammed down to long off, didn't make the most of that
thuds into the pads, back down the pitch to Shabbir
CRUNCHED! shot of the day, comes down the track and launches this over the umpire's head and down to the fence
short, moving away, extra pace there but Rana lucky to get away with that as a wide
over the keeper's head! that's Twenty20, once a batsman gets going things go their way, the top edge flies away
MAX! helped over deep square-leg for South Africa's first six, using the pace of Rana and Bosman just places it over the man on the fence
slower ball, well bowled, but they scamper a single
down the pitch, thick outside edge and goes down to third man
CRACKED! Smith continues on his way, but with a little help from mid on who lets it go through his legs and it races away
another no-ball, Pakistan's third! thumped to mid on, who stops it this time
swung hard down to long on, there's a little fumble and they get a brace
steps down the pitch, swings hard but doesn't watch the ball all the way and misses
SLAPPED! he watched this one all the way, a meaty swing over midwicket and away to the fence
gets the bottom half of the bat onto this pull, dribbles onto the on side
WOW! that's out of here! hammered over deep midwicket for a maximum, and there's no stopping Smith at the moment
pushed into the covers
worked down to long on
worked off his legs to deep backward square
MASSIVE! launched over long off for the third six of the innings
pushed down the ground to long on
short and pulled out to deep midwicket
angled down to third man
CLUBBED! through midwicket for another boundary. Easy...as...you...like for South Africa
comes down the pitch, almost yorks himself, but works it through mid on
pure power from Smith, over mid on. Full, short, it doesn't matter, it just goes
thumped into the covers
goes for the pull, misses, and the ball goes over middle stump. Rare occasion of Smith not connecting
short, helped out to backward square-leg and it's easy pickings for Bosman
driven down to long on
misses an attempted flick through midwicket
pushed out to deep cover
DROPPED! swung down to long on, what a mess by the man on the fence - Akmal of all people! - and Bosman gets a life
played into the covers
SLAM! great fifty, cracked away through point and races to the fence as Bosman reaches a half-century off 27 balls, the fastest by a South African
into the covers
HUGE! short and launched over midwicket for a huge maximum, this is a cakewalk
worked into the leg side
cut to backward point, tight single but TV shows Bosman is safe and Smith reaches fifty off 35 balls
clubbed, crunched, crashed...it's another maximum as Smith launches over deep midwicket again
tucked to short fine-leg
well outside off stump
punched to short extra cover
YIPES! that nearly cleaned up Smith as Bosman cracks it straight and Smith has to sway out of the way to avoid a ball in the face
that was a closer call, but no sympathy from the umpire
this is nearly all over as Smith goes emphatically over extra cover
ANOTHER! blimey, it's hard to keep up as Smith flays through point this time and South Africa now need just five...this is the best stand for ANY wicket in Twenty20 Internationals...what an effort
can't find the gap, cover fields
short, slammed out to deep cover
WHAT A WAY TO FINISH! as you can probably guess, it was swung into the stands at deep midwicket, Smith's fourth six and the sixth of the innings....and that's that
